history.narrative: Law 7-135, the “District of Columbia Minor Theatrical Employment Permit Amendment Act of 1988,” was introduced in Council and assigned Bill No. 7-397, which was referred to the Committee on Education and Libraries. The Bill was adopted on first and second readings on April 19, 1988, and May 3, 1988, respectively. Signed by the Mayor on May 19, 1988, it was assigned Act No. 7-185 and transmitted to both Houses of Congress for its review.
